title: 2017 world championship crafting
body: can I ask what does - Championship Ashe Border means? and Golden Championship Ashe Chroma tho? ty

replies.body: Don't fall for it!  Last time for the yasuo/riven borders, if you got those you had to buy the skin too!  I guarantee you that's what this is again.  Just another disgusting attempt at a cash grab from greedy Riot!

Well......yea you gotta own the skin for the border to work. Borders are made for specific skins, if you don't want the skin don't buy the border! This is like saying "I can't play my ps4 game without a ps4!" -_-'

Wait,I buy the skin I get the border,do I need to play just her with the skin and then I get the border or I can play some other champs and it will be there?Or is it just a border when I play Championship Ashe?
That border will only work for Championship Ashe specifically. It won't work for any other champion or skin.

Kinda overkill with the harshness, don't you think? Not saying Rioters aren't allowed to be a little rude but jeez. Most people don't fully understand all these extras, so a little patience and kindness might go a long way.
So... what if I have 75 tokens and have 3 of the missions  complete and no missions left? ALSO got the master pass to GET more missions, so overall confused. *Been waiting for the next weekly mission

The Championship Ashe border is designed to give that skin a little bit of extra flair on the loading screen. It'll look like the image below. Think of it like putting fancy spinners on your car. The Chroma for that skin is similar to the other chromas, it's a slightly different color scheme to make her stand out from the others!
